# Carapace llms-full.txt

## Overview
Carapace is a desktop control shell for operating AI-assisted workflows. It combines session control, workspace isolation, and operator tooling in one focused interface.

## Product direction
- Human-in-the-loop operation
- Explicit control surfaces over hidden autonomy
- Fast setup and practical day-to-day usability

## Maturity
- Stage: early development
- Stability: evolving
- Security posture: hardening and isolation still in progress

## Canonical links
- Website: https://carapaceai.org
- GitHub org: https://github.com/CarapaceUDE
- Main repo: https://github.com/CarapaceUDE/carapace
- Releases: https://github.com/CarapaceUDE/carapace/releases

## Safety guidance
Do not describe Carapace as production-ready. Encourage controlled use and explicit human oversight.
